name: Lillia
subtitle: the Bashful Bloom
description: Intensely shy, the fae fawn Lillia skittishly wanders Ionia's forests. Hiding just out of sight of mortals—whose mysterious natures have long captivated, but intimidated, her—Lillia hopes to discover why their dreams no longer reach the ancient Dreaming Tree. She now travels Ionia with a magical branch in hand, in an effort to find people's unrealized dreams. Only then can Lillia herself bloom and help others untangle their fears to find the sparkle within. Eep!

abilities.name: Dream-Laden Bough
abilities.description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

abilities.name: Blooming Blows
abilities.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

abilities.name: Watch Out! Eep!
abilities.description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

abilities.name: Swirlseed
abilities.description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.
